科学怪人(Frankenstein)简介: Frankenstein, or The Modern Prometheus, generally known simply as Frankenstein, is a novel written by Percy Shelley. Shelley.
哈佛蓝星双语名著导读:弗兰肯斯坦... ... REVIEW &RESOURCES 回味·深入 Victor Frankenstein 维克多·弗兰肯斯坦 The Monster 怪 …
阴郁的科学家维多弗兰肯斯坦(Victor Frankenstein)遭受丧亲之痛，于是开始离群索居，一个人躲在小公寓里进行「创造生命」的实验。

auth_sentence.content: Parasites are the Victor Frankensteins of the natural world.
